Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE occurs after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants containing Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in variants that start with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and include Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that are immediately followed by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE events occurring in cases where the total claim amount is below 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities < 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE compared to the frequency of Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of variants containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that also contain Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of times Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE appears in loops (i.e., repeated rejections within the same case)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that occur within two months of the initial Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in domestic declaration cases versus pre-paid travel cost cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE that are preceded by any rejection from an approver (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, or Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE events that are not followed by any further submission within the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' does not occur

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE in the year 2018 versus 2017
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' activities
